backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and stable vars for content, with admin‑gated CRUD for events, APK URL, and access‑controlled user profile queries.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/docs/adsense.md: Guide for enabling Google AdSense via environment variable and adding the client ID.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Instructions for generating an Android APK from the PWA using Bubblewrap and TWA.
frontend/docs/custom-domain-yfo-dns-and-: Documentation for configuring yfo.org DNS and verifying the domain in Google Search Console.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Production deployment checklist and Google Search Console verification steps for the IC site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template configuring SEO, PWA meta tags, and root mount point.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Placeholder ads.txt file instructing replacement with real AdSense publisher entries.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining icons, colors, metadata, and categories for the YFO app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots rules allowing crawlers but blocking /me/ admin routes and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing all public site routes with update frequencies and priorities.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker caching static assets and handling fetch with network-first strategy while avoiding HTML caching.
frontend/scripts/run-prod-build-with-gsc: Orchestrates the production build, logs steps, verifies build output, and runs a Google Search Console meta tag check.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Checks dist/index.html for the required Google Search Console verification meta tag and exits on failure.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main React app routing structure using TanStack Router for public and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: Handles image/video selection, validation, upload progress, preview, and removal for admin media inputs.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by checking admin session and redirecting unauthorized users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with social links, quick navigation, and share functionality.
frontend/src/components/HomeBottomNavMen: Provides a mobile bottom navigation menu using a sheet component with dynamic routing.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA install banner with install and dismiss actions using the PWA install prompt hook.
frontend/src/components/SettingsSheet.ts: Provides a settings panel with theme toggle, sharing tools, PWA install action, and APK download support.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements the top navigation bar with branding, links, mobile menu, sharing, logout, and settings access.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines the default logo and returns branding logo URLs with fallback.
frontend/src/config/navLinks.ts: Declares primary navigation links and computes the appropriate user dashboard link based on admin status.
frontend/src/config/publicSite.ts: Exports the public site URL with optional environment override.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Stores admin login state with hardcoded credentials using persisted Zustand storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Provides a hook that manages the PWA install prompt, tracks installability, and handles user dismissal.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as branding, history, memberships, and clubs.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Implements a theme hook that applies and toggles between light and dark modes using stored preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including typography and color tokens.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with top navigation, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a public About page with the organization's story, mission, vision, and values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface for editing About sections, supporting media, reordering, adding, and saving content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAndroidApkPage.t: Provides an admin page to view and update the Android APK download URL with validation and status messages.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin interface to load, edit, and save organization branding such as logo and name, with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Provides CRUD management for clubs, including creating, editing, and deleting club entries with form handling and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays admin dashboard with navigation links to various management tools like branding, home page, and about editor.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEventsManagerPag: Allows admins to create, edit, and delete events with form validation, success/error messages, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Page for editing the history content and associated media with save functionality and loading state support.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Admin interface for editing homepage sections, allowing CRUD of section titles, descriptions, and images with save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login form handling authentication and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Displays and reviews membership registrations, showing details for each submission with loading and error states.
Admin form for viewing and updating social media link URLs with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information for a specific club, including loading, error, and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Displays a list of clubs with loading, error, and empty states, and links to individual club pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact methods including email, phone, location, and office hours using card components.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays upcoming events with parsed dates, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays organizational history content with optional media and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page hero, dynamic sections, and links using fetched content or defaults.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Provides a membership registration form with submission handling and a success confirmation view.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with scrollable sections outlining data usage and privacy practices.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of youth programs with icons, descriptions, age ranges, schedules, and a join call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Renders the Terms of Service page with scrollable sections describing site usage rules and membership requirements.
frontend/src/utils/adsense.ts: Injects the Google AdSense script once using a client ID from environment variables.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Provides media validation, file reading, preview URL helpers, and type checks for images and videos.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Updates canonical and Open Graph URL meta tags for SEO based on the current route.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Implements URL sharing via Web Share API with clipboard fallback and structured result reporting.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Manages light/dark theme storage and application using localStorage and DOM class toggling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage and hash/query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, architecture notes, known issues, generated assets, and existing features for ongoing UI, admin, and deployment work.
